price: (74) Indeed, the criminals will be in the punishment of Hell, abiding eternally.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna al-muj'rimīna fī ʿadhābi jahannama khālidūna
